name: Sukhibhava Foundation
briefDescription: Sukhibhava works towards making menstruation a non-issue for women and girls in the low income and marginalised communities across India. Sukhibhava is currently working across 7 states and has launched its flagship event - The Period fellowship. Sukhibhava identifies women living in the low-income communities to  become "Community Resource Persons", who form groups of women and girls to educate about menstrual hygiene and improve access to affordable menstrual hygiene products.

address: No 288, 1st A cross, Nagashettyhalli, RMV 2nd stage,
